title: 51  Kurt Schwitters, Merz, 1922
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">51  
Kurt Schwitters (German 1887–1948)  
Merz  
1922  
Collage composed of cut and pasted paper elements, with brush and red and black ink, on tan wove card; 310 × 236 mm  
Gift of Dorothy Braude Edinburg to the Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection, 2012.92

</section><section id="figures">Kurt Schwitters, Merz, 1922.
